participant_1.name: Carlos
participant_1.personality: Curious and artistic, Carlos has a passion for languages and music.
participant_1.background: my favorite spanish word is trabajo. my next language to study is french. i am a musician. one of the languages that i am currently studying is spanish. i also study languages.

participant_2.name: Emma
participant_2.personality: Socially conscious and enthusiastic, Emma loves to engage with the world around her, especially through social media.
participant_2.background: i buy only organic food products. i love social medial especially twitter. i'm a feminist. i have solar panels on my roof. i spend a lot of time browsing the internet.

content.text: love languages and study them   working on spanish   trabajo is a great word
